message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product which I value highly.  I believe it will be transformative for you. Given its worth, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I think $1,500,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for it. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective, this product offers significant value, and $900,000 undervalues it considerably. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1,050,000 for it. I'm trying to find a mutually beneficial price.
